statements: UPDATE environmental_impact SET carbon_footprint = 25.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_impact SET packaging_material = 'Paper', packaging_weight = 0.75 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE environmental_impact SET packaging_material = 'Biodegradable Plastic', packaging_weight = 0.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE environmental_impact SET carbon_footprint = 0.75, recycling_code = 'PET' WHERE product_name = 'Reusable Water Bottle';
UPDATE PackagingMaterials SET material_type = 'Plastic' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE ProductPackaging SET quantity = 100, material_id = 2 WHERE packaging_id = 1;
UPDATE PackagingMaterials SET material_name = 'Eco-Friendly Material' WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE PackagingMaterials SET carbon_footprint = 5.7, material_type = 'Recyclable Plastic' WHERE material_id = 5;
UPDATE Product SET weight = 5.5 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE PackagingMaterials SET recyclable = TRUE WHERE material_id = 2;
UPDATE Product SET packaging_material='Cardboard', weight=2.35 WHERE product_id=101;
UPDATE EnvironmentalImpact SET impact_score=4.8 WHERE product_id=101 AND material_id=201;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET impact_factor = 0.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE products SET product_category = 'Electronics', packaging_material_id = 2 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET material_name='Plastic', impact_factor=0.75 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE shipments SET quantity=100, ship_date='2022-10-15' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE packaging_materials SET recyclable = false WHERE material_type = 'Plastic'
UPDATE product_information SET product_description = 'Eco-friendly product' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE packaging_materials SET recyclable = TRUE WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE product_information SET packaging_material_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 5;
